name: One Long Way Home
description:
It's about a frog, taking a long way home, lightened by a single candle

The first game I actually finished, so congratulations to me. Hope you'll like it. Would be glad to hear any opinion, especially with understandable for a child instructions on how to improve everything that doesn't work. And I didn't succeeded in making it browser. And I still don't know how to make this page nicer.
